title: Content + Shopify Marketing VA for Luxury Hair Brand (Reels, TikToks, Canva)
job_overview:
Hi! I’m the owner of a U.S.-based luxury raw hair company and storefront. I’m looking for a creative, organized, and reliable virtual assistant who can help with both content creation and Shopify support to grow my brand online.



 CONTENT + SOCIAL MEDIA
 • Edit Reels/TikToks using raw videos I send
 • Add trending music, captions, transitions
 • Create flyers & stories using Canva Pro
 • Post to Instagram + TikTok (Meta Suite or TikTok Scheduler)
 • Suggest content ideas and monitor trends



 SHOPIFY SUPPORT
 • Add/edit product listings
 • Update homepage banners, sales, and collections
 • Tag products, manage images, assist during launches



 Bonus if you know:
 • Klaviyo (email campaigns)
 • Influencer outreach or UGC research



 Requirements:
 • Canva Pro
 • Video editing tools (CapCut, InShot, VN, etc.)
 • Shopify experience (backend management and content edits)



 Details:
 • 15–20 hours/week
 • $4–$5/hour (based on experience)
 • Flexible schedule — just meet deadlines
 • Long-term position for the right fit
 • Paid monthly via Wise, PayPal, or Remitly



 To Apply, Please Submit:
 1. 2–4 edited Reels or TikToks (showing your video editing skills)
 2. 2–3 Canva flyers or IG Story graphics
 3. Screenshot or link to any Shopify work you’ve done
 4. Your hourly rate, time zone, and availability
 5. (Optional but appreciated) A short voice note or video intro explaining why you’d be a great fit for a luxury beauty brand

 Use the word “SZN7Luxe” in your message or subject line so I know you read everything carefully. Applications without it will not be considered.
